00071     public function run()
00072     {
00073         //  Validate baseUrl
00074         if ( $this->isEmpty( $this->baseUrl ) )
00075             $this->baseUrl = $this->extLibUrl . '/jqRating';
00076 
00077         //  Register the scripts/css
00078         $this->registerClientScripts();
00079 
00080         $this->html = $this->render( 
00081             $this->viewName,
00082             array( "options" => $this->makeOptions() ),
00083             $this->returnString
00084         );
00085 
00086         return $this->html;
00087     }

00094     public function registerClientScripts()
00095     {
00096         //  Daddy...
00097         parent::registerClientScripts();
00098 
00099         //  Register scripts necessary
00100         $this->pushScriptFile( "{$this->baseUrl}/jquery.MetaData.js" );

00102 
00103         //  Get the javascript for this widget
00104         if ( ! $this->supressScripts && ! $this->returnString )
00105             $this->registerWidgetScript();
00106 
00107         //  Register css files...
00108         PS::_rcf( "{$this->baseUrl}/jquery.rating.css", 'screen' );

00119     protected function generateJavascript()
00120     {
00121         //  No callback set? then make the ajax callback
00122         if ( ! isset( $this->callbacks[ 'callback' ] ) && ! empty( $this->ajaxCallback ) )
00123         {
00124             $_arTemp = array(
00125                 'type' => 'GET',
00126                 'url' => PS::_cu( $this->ajaxCallback ),
00127                 'dataType' => 'html'
00128             );
00129 
00130             $_sCBBody = 'function(value,link){var arTemp = ' . CJavaScript::encode( $_arTemp ) . '; arTemp[\'data\'] = \'value=\'+value+\'&link=\'+link; jQuery.ajax(arTemp);}';
00131 
00132             $this->callbacks[ 'callback' ] = $_sCBBody;
00133         }
00134 
00135         $_arOptions = $this->makeOptions();
00136 
00137         //  Now rating apply...
00138         $this->script .= 'jQuery(\'.' . $this->starClass . '\').rating(' . $_arOptions . '); ';
00139 
00140         return $this->script;
00141     }

00148     protected function generateHtml()
00149     {
00150         $_iMaxCount = $this->starCount;
00151 
00152         //  Handle multiple star outputs...
00153         if ( $this->half )
00154             $this->split = 2;
00155 
00156         if ( $this->split > 1 )
00157             $_iMaxCount *= $this->split;
00158 
00159         for ( $_i = 0; $_i < $_iMaxCount; $_i++ )
00160         {
00161             $_sHtml .= '<input type="radio" class="' . $this->starClass;
00162 
00163             if ( $this->half )
00164                 $_sHtml .= ' {half:true}';
00165             else if ( $this->split > 1 )
00166                 $_sHtml .= ' {split:' . $this->split . '}';
00167 
00168             $_sHtml .= '" name="' . $this->name . '" ';
00169 
00170             if ( is_array( $this->starTitles ) && sizeof( $this->starTitles ) > 0 )
00171                 $_sHtml .= 'title="' . $this->starTitles[ $_i ] . '" ';
00172 
00173             if ( is_array( $this->starValues ) && sizeof( $this->starValues ) > 0 )
00174                 $_sHtml .= 'value="' . $this->starValues[ $_i ] . '" ';
00175             else
00176                 $_sHtml .= 'value="' . ( $_i + 1 ) . '" ';
00177 
00178             if ( $this->selectValue != 0 && ( $this->selectValue * $this->split ) == ( $_i + 1 ) )
00179                 $_sHtml .= 'checked="checked" ';
00180 
00181             $_sHtml .= ' />';
00182         }
00183 
00184         return( $_sHtml );
00185     }

00216     public static function createRating( $arOptions )

00218         static $_iIdCount = 0;
00219 
00220         //  Fix up the base url...
00221         $_sBaseUrl = PS::o( $arOptions, 'baseUrl', '' );

00228

00230         $sName = PS::o( $arOptions, 'name' );
00231 
00232         //  Build the options...
00233         $_arOptions = array(
00234             'supressScripts' => PS::o( $arOptions, 'supressScripts', false ),
00235             'returnString' => PS::o( $arOptions, 'returnString', false ),
00236             'readOnly' => PS::o( $arOptions, 'readOnly', false ),
00237             'required' => PS::o( $arOptions, 'required', false ),
00238             'baseUrl' => PS::o( $arOptions, 'baseUrl', $_sBaseUrl ),
00239             'name' => ( $sName == null ? 'rating' . $_iIdCount : $sName . $_iIdCount ),
00240             'starClass' => PS::o( $arOptions, 'starClass', 'star' ),
00241             'split' => PS::o( $arOptions, 'split', 1 ),
00242             'starCount' => PS::o( $arOptions, 'starCount', 5 ),
00243             'selectValue' => ( double )PS::o( $arOptions, 'selectValue', 0 ),
00244             'ajaxCallback' => PS::o( $arOptions, 'ajaxCallback' ),
00245             'starTitles' => PS::o( $arOptions, 'starTitles' ),

00247             'hoverTips' => PS::o( $arOptions, 'hoverTips' ),
